code: import React,{Component}from"react";import AboutMenuItem from"./AboutMenuItem";import AboutSubheading from"./AboutSubheading";import subheadingsData from"./subheadingsData";import personalIcon from"../assets/moebius-triangle.png";import educationIcon from"../assets/upgrade.png";import careerIcon from"../assets/triple-corn.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class AboutMenu extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.handleMenuItemClick=menuItem=>{this.setState({activeMenuItem:menuItem,activeSubheading:1});};this.handleSubheadingClick=subheading=>{this.setState({activeSubheading:subheading});};this.state={activeMenuItem:1,activeSubheading:1};}render(){const{activeMenuItem,activeSubheading}=this.state;const menuItems=["PERSONAL","EDUCATION","CAREER"];const activeMenuTitle=menuItems[activeMenuItem-1];const activeMenuIcon=activeMenuTitle==="PERSONAL"?personalIcon:activeMenuTitle==="EDUCATION"?educationIcon:careerIcon;const subheadings=subheadingsData[activeMenuItem];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu",children:menuItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutMenuItem,{title:item,active:activeMenuItem===index+1,onClick:()=>this.handleMenuItemClick(index+1)},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sub-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"icon-title-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:activeMenuIcon,alt:activeMenuTitle,className:"icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:activeMenuTitle})]}),subheadings.map((subheading,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutSubheading,{title:subheading.title,content:subheading.content,active:activeSubheading===index+1,onClick:()=>this.handleSubheadingClick(index+1),menuItem:activeMenuItem},index))]})]});}}
